name: Bravo Software JSC
description:
BRAVO Software Joint Stock Company specializes in research, development and application deployment of IT software systems into production management and business management in order to enhance the efficiency of operation and administration in the enterprises and business - social organizations. BRAVO?s key products are ?Software of accounting ? financial management, Enterprises resource planning - ERP? and services.

BRAVO?s advantages are its deep understanding of Vietnamese accounting regime, managerial features of Vietnamese enterprises, international accounting, and its experience in software deployment as well.
